stages.name: On the Way to the Pirate Ship
stages.description: Party members must kill all monsters in the map.

stages.name: Through hte Head of the Ship!
stages.description: Talk to Guon to summon the first wave of monsters (Mr. Alli's) and collect 20 Mark of the Rookie Pirate (4001120). Talk to Guon again to summon another wave of monsters (Kru) and collect 20 Mark of the Rising Pirate (4001121). Talk to Guon again to summon a final wave of monsters (Captain) and collect 20 Mark of the Veteran Pirate (4001122). Talk to Guon again a final time to advance to the next stage.

stages.name: Through the Deck I
stages.description: Party members must kill all monsters in the map. If you kill all enemies in The Area of 100yrOld Bellflower I, speaking with Guon will summon a treasure chest. If opened via a Lord Pirate's Key to Chest (4031437) it will elevate the Lord Pirate's boss fight difficulty (and rewards).

stages.name: Through the Deck II
stages.description: Party members must kill all monsters in the map. If you kill all enemies in The Area of 100yrOld Bellflower II, speaking with Guon will summon a treasure chest. If opened via a Lord Pirate's Key to Chest (4031437) it will elevate the Lord Pirate's boss fight difficulty (and rewards).

stages.name: Eliminate Pirates!
stages.description: Party members must kill all monsters in the map, and hunt for 4 Old Metal Keys to close the open doors.

stages.name: Boss Stage
stages.description: Party members must kill Lord Pirate. Depending on if any optional quests were performed, you may fight Peeking Lord Pirate, Angry Lord Pirate, or Enraged Lord Pirate.
